Html:
HI, i'm making a litle GIS software wit this grate app!!
I need at this moment to make an "address validation" to save this address in my local database, validated with some provider, like googlemaps in example.
We are using this function
PointLatLng? pos = GMapProviders.GoogleMap.GetPoint(Domicilio, out status);
then pass in "Domicilio" var an unvalidated address, like "guido spano 2600, villa luzuriaga" and if stattus is ok, give me the point of "Guido y Spano 2599, Villa Luzuriaga, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina"
I need to get this value when i write this, from the same GetPoint function, because if i make an marker and get the address of this marker, generally is diferent from i wrote (the other street intersection when are corners)
somebody make an validator, or autocomplete?? i think that i can use some of this!!
I hope can express my problem! thanks and sorry for my english!!

PD: is like this, another example, if y send
http://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/geocode/json?address=marcon+2600,+villa+luzuriaga+Argentina&sensor=false

return to me in formatted_address
"Monseñor José Francisco Marcon 2600, San Justo, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina",
Thanks again!!
